Headline: Delays Affecting 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Trains
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with delays due to track switching problems near Central Park. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with delays due to track switching problems near Central Park.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems at Dempster-Skokie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
